page.title: 19Droitwich -A School Day
page.content: At 7.30 I wake up, read for 10mins, get washed, dressed and put on a white shirt, red tie and grey skirt. I watch Breakfast TV and at 8.15 wash up and go to school. At 8.27 the bell rings and we line up to go to registration. The first lesson,Humanities, lasts from 9-10.05, followed by a 15 min break, when we go out on the yard and chatter to our friends or play games. After my second lesson, Maths (10.20 - 11.30) I go home for lunch. I return to school at 12.30. At 12.50 the tennis lesson starts and sometimes we go swimming afterwards in the school pool.At 1.55 we have another 15 min break, after which we have our last lesson of the day, Humanities. At 3.20 the final bell rings and I collect my coat and bag from the cloakroom and go home.My father(47),mother(37),my two brothers (16+8),my sister(15)+me(12)
